conservative.name: Perform a Stunt
conservative.special: Special: Use this action to apply a skill in an unusual way, or to attempt a dramatic or story-driven activity not covered by a specific action card

success.description: You perform the action incredibly well, and may perform a free manoeuvre

boon.description: If the check relied on a physical characteristic, recover 1 fatigue. If the check relied on a mental characteristic, recover 1 stress

bane.description: If the check relied on a physical characteristic, suffer 1 fatigue. If the check relied on a mental characteristic, suffer 1 stress
